name: @ensono-task/taskctl-setup
description: Sets up on host the taskctl binary

scripts.build:
../../node_modules/.bin/tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck && ../../node_modules/.bin/esbuild --bundle ./src/index.ts --outfile=task.js --banner:js='// Generated Code
// Needs to be checked in' --platform=node --format=cjs
